scripts.build: pnpm --filter {{sdkName}} run build && pnpm --filter {{cliName}} run build && pnpm --filter {{projectName}}-docs run build && pnpm --filter {{projectName}}-blog run build && pnpm --filter {{projectName}}-web run build
scripts.deploy:blog: pnpm --filter {{projectName}}-blog run build && netlify deploy --dir apps/blog/dist --prod
scripts.deploy:docs: pnpm --filter {{projectName}}-docs run build && netlify deploy --dir apps/docs/dist --prod
scripts.deploy:web: pnpm --filter {{projectName}}-web run build && netlify deploy --dir apps/web/dist --prod
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter {{sdkName}} run build && pnpm --filter {{sdkName}} run lint && pnpm --filter {{cliName}} run lint
